description.value: The Bakerlight ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.
All allies in a 25 foot aura gain 10 Cold Resistance and +1 on Skill Checks related to creative arts and academics.

The Bakerlight burns bright and hot. The Bakerlight and allies within 30 feet may reroll any 1s on damage dice and gains +2 to all ability checks. The Bakerlight gains an Aura that extends out 15 feet and deals @Damage[2d6[fire]] to any creature that starts its turn in that area. The Bakerlight may choose to exclude any objects, items, or creatures it wishes from this aura. This may be continued over multiple rounds using the Sustain a Spell Action. At the end of the Bakerlight's next turn, roll [[/r 1d6]]. If any of these dice have a result of 6, this ability ends and the Bakerlight must activate Burn Out as a free action and immediately end Burn Bright. On each subsequent turn, if Burn Bright is active, add an additional 1d6 to this roll (max 6d6). Once Burn Bright is used it may not be used again for 24 hours.

As long as Burn Out is active, the Bakerlight has Weakness 5 to all sources of damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. At the end of the Bakerlight's next turn, roll [[/r 1d6]]. If any of these dice have a result of 6, this ability ends. On each subsequent turn, if Burn out is in effect, add an additional 1d6 to this roll. (Max 6d6)
